summaries.short: This is an interview with two girls of school-going age, Megan and Viveca. They talk about their lives
summaries.medium: Megan and Viveca talk about their holiday to France with their family, their life at home with their parents and brother, what they do in their spare time and how they like school.
summaries.long: Megan and Viveca discuss what they typically do while holidaying in France with their family. They talk about their favourite things to do in Reading, which is where they live. They discuss their music lessons and the grade they are at in the lessons. They like school and discuss various things such as the uniform, their favourite teacher, favourite subjects, the amount of homework they get and what they would like to be when they grow up.
